Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25629 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.42.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25629 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.42.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grpc is earlier than 1.42.0-9, affected by CVE-2024-25629
